resources.string: phraseCoach
Coach Phrases Â®
Phrase Icon
Generate New Phrase
Click the button below to generate a random phrase
People often say that motivation doesn\'t last forever. Well, neither does the bath effect, so it is recommended daily.
Persistence is the path to success.
Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
In the midst of difficulty lies opportunity.
All human action, whether it becomes positive or negative, must depend on motivation.
I make difficulty my motivation. The back up comes next.
Stones on the way? I keep them all. One day I will build a castle.
The desire to be healed is part of healing.
What worries me is not the scream of the bad guys. It\'s the silence of the good guys.
Imagine a new story for your life and believe in it.
When fate leaves something valuable in your lap, you don\'t just throw it away.
Good taste is for people who can\'t afford sapphires.
Conviction brings emotion, the enemy of oratory.
I think so you don\'t have to think.
You don\'t trade when you\'re at your worst.
